resources.string: Supports quick search and classification of plants
Plant care is easy with the schedule provided
Story articles revolving around related topics are continuously updated
Searching by image and classifying by plant properties helps find in a snap
Determine the plant\'\s condition to come up with the most appropriate care process
Time to start exploring the world of plants and start building your own garden.
